mapper.insert: insert into clan_war (clan_tag, tag, season, state, team_size, preparation_start_time, start_time, end_time, type) values (#{warInfo.clanTag}, #{warInfo.tag}, #{warInfo.season}, #{warInfo.state}, #{warInfo.teamSize}, #{warInfo.preparationStartTime}, #{warInfo.startTime}, #{warInfo.endTime}, #{warInfo.type}) on duplicate key update `state` = values(state), `update_time` = now()
mapper.select: select * from clan_war where state != 'warEnded' and clan_tag = #{tag} and type = 'league'
